title: Mobile phone

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for the mobile phone, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a perspective view of a mobile phone;
FIG. 2 is a front view of the mobile phone of FIG. 1;
FIG. 3 is a rear view of the mobile phone of FIG. 1;
FIG. 4 is a left-side view of the mobile phone of FIG. 1;
FIG. 5 is a right-side view of the mobile phone of FIG. 1;
FIG. 6 is a top plan view of the mobile phone of FIG. 1;
FIG. 7 is a bottom plan view of the mobile phone of FIG. 1;
FIG. 8 is a front perspective view of the mobile phone of FIG. 1 in an open position; and,
FIG. 9 is a rear view of the mobile phone of FIG. 8.
